Franz Liszt

Sept Variations brillantes sur un thème de Rossini, S. 149

c. 1824 · LW A4 · R. 28

[IMSLP]

The theme, Ah come nascondere la fiamma from Gioacchino Rossini’s opera Ermione, is preceded by an introduction and followed by seven variations.

Recommended editions

  • New Liszt Edition (Editio Musica Budapest) · II/1 · Z. A/B 8766 · Free Arrangements I · ed. Györgyi Éger / Géza Gémesi / Imre Mező / Imre Sulyok

Duration: 9'

Difficulty: 3.5
